We recommend that you access the “Prefer: Preporučujemo vam da pristupite odeljku „Željena podešavanja“ kako biste preuzeli „Ključ za oporavak naloga“ i bezbjedno ga uskladištili. Ovaj ključ će biti neophodan za vraćanje pristupa platformi i podacima u slučaju da zaboravite lozinku.
The number of activities recently detect:
The number of activities recently detected appears to be higher than usual.

This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.

Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.

The activities with unusual stats are:
{ActivityDump}
{FreeMemory} of {TotalMemory} available:
{FreeMemory} of {TotalMemory} available diskspace used.

Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is a tes:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is a test email sent out from the platform's administrative interface.

Reception of this email indicates that the server was able to authenticate to and interact with the SMTP mail server.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to notify you that a request has been made to change your email address to {NewEmailAddress}.

Click the following link to validate this change:
{Url}

If you didn't request this change, change your password and contact your system administrator.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
New request of access to a whistleblower: Novi zahtjev za pristup identitetu uzbunjivača
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to inform you that your PGP key is expiring or has already expired.

You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.

{PGPKeyInfo}

Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\n{ExpiringSubm:
Dear {RecipientName},

{ExpiringSubmissionCount} reports are expiring and will be soon deleted.

The earliest expiration date is {EarliestExpirationDate}.

Please remember to check them before they are deleted.

{Url}

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Dear {RecipientName},\\n\\nThis is an em:
Dear {RecipientName},

This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their report.

You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this report should be considered to be of high importance.

The report can be accessed at:
{Url}

Kind regards,
{NodeName}
Reminder about unread or updated reports: Podsjetnik o nepročitanim ili ažuriranim prijavama

Please summarize your report in a few wo: Opišite svoju prijavu u nekoliko riječi.
I witnessed the facts in person: I witnessed the facts in person
I was personally told by a direct witnes: I was personally told by a direct witness
It is a rumor I heard: It is a rumor I heard
How are you involved in the reported fac: How are you involved in the reported facts?
Do you have evidence to support your rep: Do you have evidence to support your report?
Please attach the evidence to support yo: Please attach the evidence to support your report.
Please describe the evidence in detail.
A thorough description of the submitted: A thorough description of the submitted evidence enhances our ability to evaluate claims and investigate. Please take care to reference significant portions of any videos, images or documents submitted.
Have you reported the facts to other org: Have you reported the facts to other organizations and/or individuals?
Please list the organizations and/or ind: Please list the organizations and/or individuals you have informed about these facts.
Have these organizations investigated yo: Have these organizations investigated your claims? If so, what was the outcome?
What is the outcome you want to achieve: What is the outcome you want to achieve with our support?
Do you want to provide your identificati: Do you want to provide your identification information?
I prefer to be contacted via this platfo: Više volim da me kontaktiraju samo putem ove platforme
You're receiving this email because a us: Primili ste ovu e-poruku jer je za vas u sistemu otvoren korisnički nalog: {Site}

This could be a sign of an attack (for e: Ovo bi mogao biti znak napada (na primjer, neko je na vaš server unio mnoštvo lažnih informacija) ili samo porast upotrebe zbog povećane vidljivosti vašeg projekta.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Istražite ovo pitanje da biste utvrdili da li je legitimno ili ne.
The server cannot guarantee that a new r: Server ne može da garantuje da se nova prijava može sačuvati, pa su podnesci onemogućeni.
Please consider asking your technical su: Razmislite o tome da zatražite tehničku podršku da biste kreirali više prostora na disku na serveru.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: Tehnologija GlobaLeaks uključuje komponentu za provjeru statusa servera koja će vas upozoriti u slučaju da na nešto treba naročito da obratite pažnju.
For more information, log in to the Admi: Da biste se detaljnije informisali, prijavite se u interfejs za administraciju i pogledajte odjeljke „Statistika sistema“ i „Nepravilnosti“.

The automatic HTTPS certificate renewal: Automatsko obnavljanje HTTPS sertifikata zakazano za danas nije uspjelo.
